overview: A lot of rock bands break up because of a woman, but when all the members are women - and they're all fucking each other - it's a recipe for success! Lesbian Girl Band is the erotic story of a female band who manage to sing and orgasm in harmony. The girls draw inspiration from each other, and while they don't always get along, they act as muses to one another to ensure every ballad is more passionate than the last. Starring Raven Rockette, Allie Haze, Elle Alexandra, Jayden James, Cassandra Nix and Jayden Cole â€“ you'll never listen to an all-girl band the same way again!
title: Lesbian Girl Band
